isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - FUEL GAUGE SENDING UNIT; REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood
Remove cab skirt panel mounted under cab door
Remove hood fender extension assembly
Remove aerodynamic chassis skirts (if equipped)
Remove A/C refrigerant line clipping bolts and reposition A/C lines (if equipped) (right side only)
Position jack stand under cab and install bottle jack between jack stand and cab

note.para: Be careful to install bottle jack and stand in location that will not damage cab

step1.para: Remove cab skirt panel mounted under cab door on opposite side of vehicle (if equipped with chassis skirts only)

note.para: This step necessary to prevent interference between skirt panel and fender extension while raising cab

step1.para: Remove hood fender extension on opposite side of vehicle (if equipped with chassis skirts only)

note.para: This step necessary to prevent interference between skirt panel and fender extension while raising cab

step1.para: Remove front cab mount bushing lower cap & bolts
Raise complete cab assembly slightly

note.para: Do not raise cab higher than is necessary to remove fuel sender

step1.para: Remove fuel gauge sending unit
Install fuel gauge sending unit
Lower complete cab assembly
Install front cab mount bushing lower cap bolts & torque to spec. Remove bottle jack and stand.
Install hood fender extension on opposite side of vehicle (if equipped with chassis skirts only)
Install cab skirt panel mounted under cab door on opposite side of vehicle (if equipped with chassis skirts only)
Install A/C refrigerant line clipping bolts (if equipped) (right side only)
Install hood fender extension assembly
Install cab skirt panel mounted under cab door
Remove wheel chocks and close hood
